REVIEW: The razor clams were too good to be true. The desert with the vanilla custard (creme brûlée) and deep fried bay leaves was very special and indulgent

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Amazing experience as always!!!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Im completely disappointed with this place. I went with high expectations but food was average in terms on flavor… overpriced for the quality of the food.

NAME: BandF
REVIEW: It was a last minute booking with little research made except a quick scroll through the photos. I have to say it was a great choice. We were looked after by a lovely waiter Fabio who took us through all the menu in detail. The food was sized as tapas which was delicious, beautifully presented and full of flavour. Although the restaurant is quite small it isn’t loud and never felt cramped. We will definitely return.

NAME: Oman
REVIEW: If you’re seeking authentic Spanish cuisine, then Casa Mono is the place for you. The sweetbread with fennel al mono and marcona almond vinaigrette is delicious, and the shirt steak romesco and onion is absolutely fantastic and  my final recommendation fideos with chorizo, clams, and garlic sherry aioli are to die for. This is only a sample of the many delightful dishes Casa Mono has to offer to its guest.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Amazing. I see why the place has kept a Michelin star for so long.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Casa Mono’s food was absolutely fantastic- especially the razor clams, and pasta with clams and chorizo. We were really disappointed by the service. The staff were rude, seated us in a corner behind a wall, and forgot us multiple times. After taking our order, we never saw our server again. We waited a half hour after our last dish for our check.

NAME: Opentable85
REVIEW: Everything was delicious and the service was attentive

REVIEW: The service has room for improvement and food was a bit salty for my liking

REVIEW: Great food, but the restaurant needs more space. Overall, a pleasant dinner.

REVIEW: Loved Casa Mono. Food, service, and vibe were perfect.

REVIEW: Cannot praise Casa Mono enough! An absolute find. We will be back!

NAME: Liss
REVIEW: The food was excellent! The creations by the chefs we're outstanding and presented very well. I would highly recommend Casa Mono for a nice dinner with a date or some friends. Tapas style with quite the variation.

NAME: jeffreyN
REVIEW: As I remembered from past visits the food was good, but, unlike previous visits, the service was poor at best.  It was 4pm on a rainy Sunday, and the restaurant was not full.  It’s a small one room restaurant and it should be easy to stay on top of things, but the waiters were more interested in chatting with each other.  I had to ask multiple times to get a second glass of wine, and there was never an inquiry if we were enjoying our experience or wanted anything else.  The overall feeling of indifference was appalling. I won’t return.

NAME: PizzaMan
REVIEW: As soon as I walked into the restaurant, the hostess told me that I needed to be out of the restaurant after 90 minutes. Great way to start off my anniversary dinner with my wife.

REVIEW: Food was absolutely on top. Great service, nobody put us in rush. Will go back for sure

NAME: MLogan
REVIEW: The food was good, the service and hospitality was wildly lackluster. This is the only Michelin restaurant experience that I have ever had that wasn’t special. It felt like any other normal restaurant. We arrived a bit early, our table wasn’t ready. No problem at all, but when our reservation time came around, our table still wasn’t ready. We went to bar jamon next door and after about 20 more minutes our table was ready. Our server never mentioned his name. We saw him once at the beginning of the meal, briefly for a second glass of wine and for the bill. Of the 9 plates we ordered, he checked on us once. The food runner / server assistant however, was great. At the end of the meal our server came to the table and asked “do you want any dessert?”  No menu presented, no after dinner drinks offered, the staff was a bit rowdy with their shift drinks while we were still finishing our last courses. It was very apparent that we were the last table and they were ready for us to leave. We didn’t feel as if we had overstayed our welcome, our dining experience had been less than an hour and a half and every location of posted hours said they were open until midnight and it was hardly 11pm. My goal is not to bash the restaurant at all; I guess from previous Michelin dining experiences, and a nearly $400 price tag I thought it would be a bit more special.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Honestly my happiness place. Only get there very occasionally now but the food is superb and the staff is very  attentive to everything

NAME: DiegoR
REVIEW: Excellent service and Great Great Food!!! We will be back!!!

NAME: mussi9
REVIEW: Always amazing food, hospitality & ambience. We’ll be back soon!

REVIEW: a bit pricy but quality of the food is excellent.

REVIEW: The food was amazing, alittle pricey but totally worth the trip

NAME: MP99
REVIEW: Very inconsistent experience for us….some dishes are a laughable value (3 small scallops for $30!?) while others were solid (skirt steak).  Service was ok but not much attention 2nd half of meal and needed to request water twice.  Wine list seems purposely confusing for a casual spot…but you can guess why.

NAME: Lemon
REVIEW: great service and ambience. We really loved the seafood dishes

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: You gotta eat here. Everything is seriously delicious (I didn’t try some of the more adventurous fare). Great atmosphere and fun. First time I ate there I sort of wandered in. I had never heard of razor clams before and now my life’s complete. Went back with my daughter and her boyfriend last night and everything was as amazing as the first time.

NAME: Atilla
REVIEW: Pros:  as always:  great food with great ingredients and well presented, well presented.  Also, good service  Cons:  the noise level, the extremely cramped seating and the overload of salt

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The music in this place is just too loud. This has long been one of my favorite places in NYC, but the loud music is just ruining it.

NAME: 2di4
REVIEW: But I’m prejudiced—my favourite restaurant in New York.  Tapas like you’ve never had before, creamy eggs with sea urchin or strips of fried pig’s ears with melon.  Every one a winner.  Excellent all-Spanish wine list by the bottle or 250 ml.  Richly deserves its Michelin star, and not exorbitantly expensive like so many NY starred restaurants.  Can get quite buzzy in the evening—go for lunch if you can.

NAME: CarlaL
REVIEW: Great food. Excellent and extensive ￼Spanish wine list.

NAME: Delicious
REVIEW: It was wonderful to see that Casa Mono has remained consistently delicious!

NAME: AnnaD
REVIEW: Sublime Spanish tapas and service. I will recommend to go when in NY

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Todo excelente.  10 puntos.  Volvería a ir.  Recomendable

NAME: EugeneF
REVIEW: We have dined here many time and it is always a treat. A bit overpriced as they are likely justifying it on the Michelin Star which is well deserved. We didn’t love dining in the outside shed which was nicely appointed and climate controlled as part of the experience is the hustle and bustle of the open kitchen and intimate setting. We made the best of it and enjoyed the food as usual.

NAME: Foodie
REVIEW: Best meal I’ve ever had. Would go back in a heartbeat.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: A couple of your staff were not friendly!!! Food were amazing, this was not our first time dining here but this time, totally ruined the one meal experience I look forward to when I’m in New York.

NAME: Zoee
REVIEW: Food was really disappointing. Will not be coming back unfortunately

NAME: EricS
REVIEW: Elite experience. I cant imagine a restaurant being as delicious.

NAME: FavoritePlace
REVIEW: Tight Tight Tight!!!!! An old school NY restaurant with NO room between tables! Can be fun if you are in the mood for that, but annoying if you arrive expecting something different. Food is delicious and interesting. Wine choices are nice.

NAME: AndreaP
REVIEW: Food was fabulous! Soooo delicious!  Wine was fantastic!  Matt our server was great and very helpful!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: We sat outside and enjoyed a soft breeze and a little more space than some of the tables inside. Try to get a table outside of the weather is nice. The food was outstanding. 3 of us share 9 or 10 dishes - every dish was very beautifully plated and equally delicious. Our server was excellent with making suggestions and helped guide us through a very enjoyable meal. Would definitely recommend!

NAME: Experienceddiner
REVIEW: Danielle is the best! Great food, better service. Favorite spot in the city!

NAME: JSD7
REVIEW: Don't miss out on the lamb belly, scallops, bone marrow and ensalada Mono, but you really can't go wrong with their menu!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The food was off the chart. Best culinary experience of my life.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Everything we ordered here was delicious. Highly recommend the skirt steak, duck breast, albondigas and patatas bravas.  Also, the sommelier was very helpful in finding a reasonably priced bottle of wine from a huge and mostly quite pricey wine list.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Our experience was unfortunatelly unpleasant. we were rushed by a waiter from the second we sat at our table. It was very clear we had 90 min to enjoy our dinner and there was no need to rush is ordering food and asking if we are still working on our food (8 - literally eight times) while we were eating and while we still had 30 min left from the generous 90 min we had for our meal. i won’t be back. dinner is not just about food

NAME: Gallo
REVIEW: Good food, good fun. Very pleasant. Looking forward to going back.

NAME: Khutulun
REVIEW: Came here for my birthday and regretted it. The food was simply not up to par. The sweetbread was greasy and not at all seasoned. My sister and I took two bites and couldn’t finish the rest. The foie gras sauce overpowered everything in that dish. While I did enjoy some of the other dishes like the razor clams and fluke crudo, the other dishes really dampened the experience as did the service. It was busy (and loud) so the service was understandably not great. I was not asked how the food was or why the majority of the sweetbread dish was unfinished. I would not come here again and was sorry to have spent my birthday here.

NAME: SarahT
REVIEW: Always a real treat to come here. The service, food, and wine are impeccable. Looking forward to my next visit.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Absolutely love casa mono, go often with my boyfriend. When my mom came in town to visit I thought there would be no better place to take her then here! I had an 8:45 reservation showed up on time and didn’t get seated until 9:10. So disappointing. They got my name associated with my reservation wrong several times after repeatedly telling them my correct name.super upsetting

NAME: DanielS
REVIEW: Enthusiastic service. Delicious food but a bit salty.

NAME: Joie
REVIEW: just a tapas bar with pretty presentation, nyc prices, and okay service and food.

NAME: JuanPi
REVIEW: Food was bad. Did the owners change recently? It used to be one of my favorites places in NYC, but after yesterday’s experience I will never come back

NAME: Beth
REVIEW: This was an amazing culinary experience from beginning to end. Our waiter was fantastic. The food was exquisite and interesting. The wine was great. The atmosphere was relaxed and not pretentious at all. We would return in a heartbeat and would recommend it to everyone.

NAME: hsg02009
REVIEW: Excellent service, food and wine. Highly recommend.

NAME: Davidg
REVIEW: we have been coming since 2011  whenever we hit NYC, food is consistently high standard casual but sophisticated ambience, great wine and sherry list and always high quality service and insights, can't imagine not including this at least once per visit forever

NAME: LeeInNY
REVIEW: Outstanding food and excellent service. Will return for sure!

NAME: AlexB
REVIEW: The food was terrific and we had a great bottle of Vatan wine.

NAME: Maryk
REVIEW: Brilliant in every way! A glorious array of delightful and delicious small plates!

NAME: FoodLover
REVIEW: Very creative and delicious food. However, small disappointment regarding desserts during our visit: we made our order of 2 desserts and only then 5 min later the waiter returned just to tell us that restaurant is pout of one of our desserts that we ordered. This is disappointing for guest to get the hopes which had been crushed later. From the Micheline star restaurant there is an expectation to let the guest know which things are out of order before someone makes an order and set up the expectations. But overall very pleasant experience.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Razor clams, Jamon, scallops, and skirt steak delicious

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Closest thing you can get to San Sebastien in NYC (or anywhere, for that matter)

NAME: BryantP
REVIEW: Very patient staff. Busy night,as always, and our guests ran late. Can't say enough about the hostess and the staff. Food phenomenal. Great atmosphere.  Glad we have this place in the neighborhood!

NAME: EduardoRAndres
REVIEW: 100% rico!  La comida increíble, el lugar muy acogedor.

NAME: LISAU
REVIEW: Great food and ambience. Will definitely come back.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Excelent food and service 10 out of 10! Would definitely come back

NAME: Glitterbug
REVIEW: Lovely dinner, one of the few restaurants in NYC that I find worth returning to repeatedly. But please don’t serve hot tea with the teabag already sitting in the water in the cup:  place the new teabag to the side, and let the diner decide how long to steep the tea.

NAME: diner4452
REVIEW: Looking forward to returning. One of doesn’t eat pork and the other vegetarian and still so so great.

NAME: ChetK
REVIEW: Amazing sommelier- great Spanish wines Food was perfectly paced Super tasty

NAME: AinsleyEats
REVIEW: The food was incredible. Every dish was a delight and we loved every one. Service was also really great. Would highly recommend

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Very very delicious food. Been there 7 years ago and still good.

NAME: Jordaneatz
REVIEW: First time dining here…delicious and amazing food. Great ambiance. Delightful service. Had the bone marrow, razor clams, skirt steak, confit goat, and scallops as our meal. Everything was incredible and had its own style of flavor. Will be back and will recommend to others.

NAME: LGfromDC
REVIEW: This was an exceptionally delightful experience. Food was fantastic; service was impeccable; wine was thoughtfully chosen; it was a memorable meal on all fronts.

NAME: TheInvisibleHand
REVIEW: FLAWLESS VICTORY! FLAWLESS VICTORY! FLAWLESS VICTORY! FLAWLESS VICTORY! FLAWLESS VICTORY! FLAWLESS VICTORY!

NAME: RobertK
REVIEW: The service and food here are always outstanding. Our waiter recently had both great recommendations for food and wine pairing.

NAME: CrunchLunchFan
REVIEW: We ate in the outdoor shack, so the ambiance and noise were a factor of that. Food and wine, as always, wonderful. Especially the sweetbreads.

NAME: erickpereda
REVIEW: The food is interesting but never amazing. Very noisy and service was average. Overall it is a descent place to enjoy some tapas and a descent Spanish wine list with friends. It is not a place to go on a date, to discuss business nor to have an amazing dinner experience.

NAME: Onyx
REVIEW: Amazing! Thank you for a wonderful birthday celebration!

NAME: OmarJ
REVIEW: Honestly I don't understand why they have a michelin star. The food was unremarkable at best, there are plenty of better options in NYC. The ambience is also nothing special. Nothing stood out.

NAME: DFNY
REVIEW: Tiny gem with brilliant food and wine.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: En general todo fue excelente, volvería para probar el resto del menú

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Excelente servicio y calidad en los alimentos, muy recomendable

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Food was really delicious especially the quality of the ingredients and how well the sauce blended in with each dish. It’s a must try if you are in NYC

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Food was delicious and loved sitting at the chef’s bar, but it felt like dishes were brought out slowly. There was a lot of time in between dishes.

NAME: TPhil
REVIEW: Thanks to the team at Casa Mono - special shout out to our server and the sommelier!

NAME: JulieS
REVIEW: Food was great. Service was great. Restaurant space itself doesn't feel as elevated as the rest of the experience, but still totally recommend going!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Always look forward to visiting Casa Mono however I was surprised to know they didn’t really cared about out 10th year Anniversary.  I made sure to tell them our first meal together was at Casa Mono and we made sure we came back to celebrate our 10th year there.  Although we also visited many times during those 10 years. We came all the way from California and was so disappointed with the lack of acknowledgment.

NAME: StevenF
REVIEW: Although the indoor space is intimate and fairly noisy, the outdoor but fully enclosed dining was elegant and quiet, even with two other tables in our space.  Our waiter was extraordinarily helpful in explaining the complicated dishes on the creative menu.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Fabuloso!!! El restaurant es pequeño pero muy acogedor, ambiente agradable, buena atención.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Great food in general! Everything tastes perfect! Highly recommended!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Great ambiance, great food, staff very knowledgeable. Had a blast with my wife on this weekend vacation getaway!

NAME: MassielE
REVIEW: Completely amazing dining experience. Definitely coming back!!

NAME: MiamiVIce
REVIEW: Without question the best Spanish food I’ve had outside of Spain. Fantastico!!!

NAME: MaineEater
REVIEW: Every bite at Casa Mono was swoon-worthy! From the addictive crispy pig ears to the succulent shrimp to the paella croqueta...insanely delicious. The goat confit stole the show--no one should miss this gem. Incredible wine list and super knowledgeable staff. When our wine choice was delayed by needing to be chilled, our glasses were kept full of the house bubbly until it arrived. Can't wait to go back!

NAME: Philip
REVIEW: Food was amazing, wine list really great, atmosphere as well.

NAME: CruiseExec
REVIEW: Always a fantastic experience at this classic Tapas restaurant. Enjoyed sitting at the chef’s counter watching them prepare their amazing dishes.

NAME: MrsJ
REVIEW: Consistently great food and service.  Solid place.

NAME: StaceyW
REVIEW: Was a little disappointed that we were seated in the outdoor vestibule without the option to sit inside after waiting 20 minutes for our table. Once seated the service was fantastic. Our server and gave great recommendations and the busser Juan (I think that’s his name) was absolutely fantastic. He was incredibly attentive, courteous and detailed - as he was giving me a new fork he noticed it was dirty and immediately got a new one before I even realized.

NAME: Effdotemm
REVIEW: Quality of food was excellent. Wished that our waiter was a little bit more attentive and offer up suggestions, given that it was our first time at the place and it was a birthday dinner.   Otherwise, 4/5 overall.

NAME: Katie
REVIEW: Worst food we had at a Michelin starred restaurant and we dined at a lot of Michelin starred places. We had the burrata, scallops, skirt steak and mushrooms. All of them were below average, flavors too strong or weird spice combinations. Best part of the dinner was wine. Skip this place if you are looking for good food.

NAME: CelluloidGypsy
REVIEW: The food was good, but not outstanding. The panne con tomate was soggy and oily rather than garlicky. The salad was fantastic but the other plates were good, but nothing I’d be rushing back for.

NAME: PAFoodie
REVIEW: Dinner with the family excellent service stellar food! If you’re looking for more quiet dining outside is the way to go. Standouts-Razor Clams, Duck Breast, Sausage with honeycomb and quince, Foie gras, Black Rice. Sherry on the recommendation of the sommelier was great.

NAME: IlseV
REVIEW: Very small en noisy restaurant. We needed to sit in a little corner very small. The food was very good but the portions were small en expensive. Every 5 minutes someone else came asking if we wanted to order more. On the reservation form i mentioned that it was my birthday that evening but they didn’t asked anything and we had the feeling they wanted us quickly to leave. We expected to spend the evening there but the food came so quickly that we had to leave soon

NAME: AlisonP
REVIEW: great good, lovely outdoor dining, good wine and amazing vibe.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The server spilled the sause onto my partner’s clothes, which ruined the day. The food is okay.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The omakasi experience was exceptional. The chefs were very generous, great recommendations from the Bar Tender Caesar as well. The host Antonio was very kind as well. Overal one of the best meals and experiences I have ever had!! Highly Recommended!!

NAME: CoryM
REVIEW: Every bite from start to finish was incredible. After a very disappointing dinner at a french bistro the prior night this was exactly what we needed. Very charming spot with amazijg food.

NAME: LeslieB
REVIEW: The food was outstanding as was the service and wine selections.

NAME: J20food
REVIEW: Everything was delicious! Mono salad, razor clams, scallops and skirt steak were the highlights.  The staff was amazing!! Love this place

NAME: SamC
REVIEW: It was pretty good overall. The food was amazing and desert was also very good! I would recommend this restaurants for those who are looking for something different.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Wonderful. Every dish was flavorful beyond Expectations.

NAME: ABNYC
REVIEW: the food is very good but knowing how much things cost in Spain, it is very pricey. Be prepared to shell out. Remember, this is NYC not Spain.

NAME: MakP
REVIEW: You can go to Casa Mono an expect to have a lovely, delicious dinner. However, given its Michelin star I went into my experience with higher expectations than usual and was somewhat disappointed. The food was excellent, better than the average New York restaurant. However, some elements were lacking: we sat in the outdoor covered seating (which I highly recommend) but inside it is uncomfortably crowded and very loud, our server was very knowledgeable but not very attentive and we didn't see him much after the initial introduction, the bathroom was a bit dirty with paper towels on the floor, and they forgot one of the dishes we ordered and we had to remind them. These are not elements that normally detract from my experience, but like I said, I expected a bit more from a Michelin starred restaurant.

NAME: DenisG
REVIEW: Great food and service; our plane was late by over an hour and they were able to sit us despite de delay, always being extremely pleasant and nice on the phone.

NAME: marcus
REVIEW: We sat outside, which was less crowded and noisy than inside.  The food is unchanged and very good, but seemed to lack some sparkle.  Wine list of interesting Spanish wines was somewhat better priced than most NYC restaurants at this time.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Food and wine were great. Sat outside and was still very comfortable. Staff could have been more friendly.

NAME: Lucullus
REVIEW: The food, as always, was outstanding. Compliments to the chef(s), for their dishes were original, authentic and perfectly prepared. The variety and quality of the ingredients were a huge success for our table of four. This is one of the best restaurants in Manhattan as far as food is concerned. However, once again, I found the noise level to be much too high. The pounding sound issuing from the several loudspeakers  in that tiny space made it difficult to sustain a conversation without having to shout to each other across the table. Excellent food needs the right environment to be fully appreciated, and loud music does not contribute to such an environment.

NAME: christianb
REVIEW: One of my go-to restaurants. Always consistent, never disappointed and always a wonderful experience.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The best Spanish wine list outside of Spain. Food is undeniably amazing. Go now.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Outstanding service and an exceptional sommelier who provided perfect pairing advice for the 15 small plate courses our party ordered.  Perfect kitchen execution in an intimate and warm setting.  Totally deserving of its Michelin star.  Looking forward to returning soon!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Delicious. The only way to describe the food at Casa Mono. We had 5 dishes plus desert with wine pairing between two of us. It was perfect. The sommelier chose delicious wines for us that went well with our food. We started with The Casa Mono Salad, which is kind of otherworldly, followed by Lamb Belly (amazing) Pulpo and their signature Bone Marrow dish, and close with the Bread Pudding… incredible. The ambience was relaxed and the service was attentive. Certainly coming back!

NAME: Mirabelle
REVIEW: I've been to this restaurant before but it's been about 4 years. It's always been good but now it's outstanding. Interesting combinations of textures and flavors done so well.

NAME: MelissaW
REVIEW: From food to wine to service, the dining at Casa Mono is stellar.

NAME: angelw
REVIEW: The foods are delicious and service are great! I would recommend them to all my friends

NAME: nnnn
REVIEW: This is a small and rather intimate restaurant. It should not be necessary with loud music. We were onyl two people in our party and had difficulties hearing each other.

NAME: hwang
REVIEW: Our reservation was 6:45pm, but we had to wait for another 15 minutes to be seated. Very tight seating so you are elbow to elbow to your neighboring tables…a little uncomfortable. The food and service are excellent.

NAME: DanielleB
REVIEW: Truly my favorite restaurant in NYC. Always a perfect experience.

NAME: James
REVIEW: Great food loved the space and a huge Spanish wine selection

NAME: LuisS
REVIEW: Extraordinary food quality and taste.  Highly recommended.  It is in my to be repeat list.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: We had to wait 30 minutes for our table even though we had a reservation.

NAME: Dennis
REVIEW: Food was great as always.  Love coming here!

NAME: Zedline
REVIEW: The service was not welcoming we felt like nobody care. A bit pushy too. I’m from Canada and Every time I come to NYC I eat at Casa Mono But t this time is the last one. Food was ok and not a big choice of wine by the glass

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Just perfect. Food end wines. Excellent value.

NAME: AgofFields
REVIEW: Went for lunch and had a GREAT experience.  Noise level was low and food was super.

NAME: RachelW
REVIEW: At Casa Mono everything is delicious. Choosing only 4-6 dishes to share is such a difficult decision and you can’t go wrong. We will definitely be back!

NAME: Barbaresco
REVIEW: Arrived early and asked the host to seat us at a corner 2-top instead of the 2-top in the middle of the room, which was right under the speakers and very loud. (I’m hard of hearing, and informed her of this.) She declined with an explanation that made no sense and then when (gently)pressed, replied brusquely, “I can’t do it.” Fifteen minutes later, she sat another couple there, who were still there when we left the restaurant. Given that this was a reasonable request at a rather expensive restaurant, and no explanation was given, this behavior was off putting and unacceptable.

NAME: 108NYC
REVIEW: Lunch is the time to go for quieter noice levels. And you can't beat the opportunity to try multiple delicious dishes. Love their perfectly cooked scallops w delicious sauce one of the best things I have ever tasted ever.

NAME: Mariacan1968
REVIEW: Brian the server is great . Food was awesome. A little pricey but overall the restaurant is great

NAME: VardanK
REVIEW: Thanks for amazing food and great service. Keep up the good work!

NAME: LeighZ
REVIEW: Incredible waiter!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Food was impeccable. Each dish had its own individual decadent flavor. They really set a high bar for comparison to other 1 michelin star restaurants.  the saucier was KILLIN it

NAME: JustinN
REVIEW: Always visit Casa Mono when I’m in NYC. One of favorite restaurants. Staff and food are amazing!

NAME: CamilaK
REVIEW: It was amazing. Would come back evertime. GREAT food

NAME: theneighborhoodMel
REVIEW: Amazing service, the staff seemed seamless ready for the guests that were seated and waiting for their tables. I felt super comfortable seated at the chefs table. We had a nice convo with chef Diego who was super hospitable and knowledgeable about their creations. He even gave us a special treat complimentary for dessert. Would Love to Make this place regular for an imitate date night with my partner.   5 stars times 100. 100 percent would recommend to anyone who is interested in trying a nice cozy Spanish eatery off of Irving st, serving dishes that would make you feel at home yet out for dinner.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Nos sentaron en espacio cubiculo cerrado afuera del Restaurante y cada vez q cerraba la puertA el ruido era inapropiado de 7 cursos 3 fueron excelentes

NAME: ROBF
REVIEW: The food was exceptional but we were seated at the bar next to the back door which was constantly being open and closed all night where cold drafts were slapping us in the midst of our meal.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Awesome food, awesome ambiance. Can’t wait to go again.

NAME: HectorC
REVIEW: Second time back, if I have to say one word it would be consistent. Both in food quality and service. No fluck they have a gazzilion Michelin Stars.  Raquel was a wonderful host and Chef Jonathan went out of his way. Considering he's the Chef of a Michelin Star restaurant, you have to appreciate his willingness to stop by and say hello to a patron that requested to say thank you in person. Awesome!  We'll be back everytime we're in NYC.

NAME: AnneF
REVIEW: Best tapas food I’ve ever had! Every choice better than the next. Definitely recommend!

NAME: Spinsrod
REVIEW: The dishes were excellent really delicious as usual. The sommelier knowledgeable, amiable and cordial. The service/waiter not so much- 15-20 minutes after we sat at our  table we were told that they needed the table by 7:30. We finished our dinner around 7:15. Around 7:40 after ignoring us walking by us about 5 times and not offering a dessert menu the waiter came back with the bill and walked away without a word about dessert. When he came back for the bill 15min later I asked for the dessert menu and he emphatically said to us “I told you we needed the table by 7:30 it is 7:41 now (it wasn’t it was later) and I can’t offer you dessert only a chocolate mousse - we need the table now” . The people at the table next to us all looked at us — heard what was going on. I declined the dessert they offered, but they brought it anyways. We put our cards and the waiter did not pick up the bill  someone else did. In all the time they took to bring the bill - ask us to leave - pick up the bill - they could’ve offer the dessert menu and even perhaps prepares/ serve the dessert that I wanted. But I guess they just wanted us out of there because they did not even offer to sit us somewhere else. One of the people sitting next to us came up to me while waiting on the line for the bathroom and told me that they had seen how rude they were and how the restaurant had essentially kicked us out for no apparent reason. I had been to Casa Mono many times, brought many friends to dine there, always a great experience until this past Friday.

NAME: SabrinaM
REVIEW: Amazing food and vibes!

NAME: Jenny
REVIEW: The food is simply delicious with nice presentation.  The staff were helpful.  We loved sitting at the counter watching the chefs made our food.

NAME: DiningDoc
REVIEW: Just magnificent. Delicious innovative small plates that were varied and wonderful. Great service.

NAME: teresa
REVIEW: Excellent place! Great wine list, amazing food! Servers and Hostess were super friendly and offered great recommendations! Will definitely come back!

NAME: GuyLewin
REVIEW: Amazing food, great service!!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: waiter was rude and told us 2-3 plates per person which was way too much and we ended up missing a reservation because it took so long

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Great staff! We were full and they let us cancel the dishes that weren’t out yet- great!

NAME: JohnF
REVIEW: Everything was above & beyond expectations! From the moment you walk in the attention to detail is exquisite! The entire experience is like a beautiful work of art…Amazing!!

NAME: MEWD
REVIEW: Fernando was an exquisite guide for our meal and his wine recommendations for 3 different tastes were absolutely perfect.

NAME: FGS1201
REVIEW: Continues to deliver! Have been here several times and while not perfect it's one of the most consistent great food experiences I've had.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: It was my birthday, and Casa mono always is amazing

NAME: Gaby
REVIEW: Always a top place for us. Love coming here. Best food ever!!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Casa Mono’s food is always amazing. I have never been disappointed with any of the dishes. The waiters are all very knowledgeable. The atmosphere is charming and welcoming.

NAME: josec
REVIEW: Ambiente exlente, espectacular servicio y la comida de otro mundo

NAME: MichelleM
REVIEW: Best food in the city, hands down. Always blown away by the flavor profiles.

NAME: Elle
REVIEW: Food was good, customer service from the sommelier wasn't good. He wasn't nice or friendly and was pushy. We are fans of Casa Mono but was disappointed with some of the customer service.

NAME: MatthewB
REVIEW: Intimate and bustling place with attentive and informative staff.  Highly refined tapas dishes and portions are perfect for two.

NAME: DidiV
REVIEW: Michellin star appropriate. Fantastic experience at Casa Mono!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: This place deserves a Michelin star. Everything was delicious and the service was excellent.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Excellent!

NAME: JohnT
REVIEW: Good. Not the Michelin starred experience I was expecting but it was lunch time. Food was interesting and fresh. Wine was OK. Staff was gracious but the experience wasn’t top notch for the money. Would recommend for a lunch or a new food experience but not for a special occasion.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: We always come to casa mono for special occasion dinners. The food, wine, and service are fantastic. Great meal every time!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Overall it was good experience. Restaurant is very cute and cozy.would it rated higher if wasn’t for the server that told us the kitchen is very small so when you order you need to order everything at the same time, tapas and main courses. For me is all about the experience so I would prefer to enjoy the food and the restaurant and I felt kind on a hurry.

NAME: Traveller
REVIEW: Expected the food to be a bit better but overall, it was good.

NAME: RGCC
REVIEW: Excellent food.  Service was average.

NAME: JathyniaG
REVIEW: This was not a Michelin star for our group of 4’s taste buds and we are foodies from Florida and California. This was a decent restaurant with some Tapas style menu options. Presentation and service was good as expected at Michelin star location but the food taste was just not a wow experience. Croquettes of Bacalao were way too strong of the fish taste it overpowered the rest, the skirt steak was 6 slices of medium done steak over peppers and onions in a small skillet ($35) and the ox piquillo peppers were 2 tiny peppers with loads of oil and some tiny pieces of meat and seasoning. ($34) the best two tapas that we enjoyed was the fideos & mackerel. Overall for the price and food quality its a 3 star.

NAME: MaryC
REVIEW: Salt is important to flavor. Most of the dishes lacked salt and proper execution. Items remade came back spitefully over salted.

NAME: miker
REVIEW: We were lucky to get a last minute reservation for my wife’s birthday by sitting in the little pavilion. Obviously, we didn’t get to see the chefs at work, but it was much quieter (and perhaps healthier with less diners inside), so we enjoyed our conversation and took our time with the meal.  The sommelier did a terrific job selecting the right bottle for our palette, while also firing the dishes in an order that didn’t leave us overly sated.  The food was divine, and we tried seven dishes — each of which was better than the last. The pig belly, pigs ears, scallops, goat confit, and skirt steak were my favorites.  Five stars!

NAME: MatthewK
REVIEW: Food was phenomenal, couldn’t recommend enough. Goat dish and pork belly were the stars but everything was memorable. Service on the other hand needs improvement. Over 2.5 hours for a two person lunch is excessive. It wasn’t that we’re given time to not feel rushed, it was just disorganized. Also had to ask for water refill several times which shouldn’t occur at a Michelin started restaurant. Highly recommend just clear your schedule. Remember the food, not the service.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: First time in a while I have dined at a starred restaurant and didn’t feel like I was getting ripped off. Dishes and service danced very well together. Reminder to myself to get the scallops again. Thank you for a lovely night, Casa Mono!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: This is our 4th date to casa mono. Casa Mono is by far our number one restaurant my partner and i have ever tried to date, and we’d like to consider ourselves food critiques and casa mono never ceases to amaze with it’s menu. Though, this last visit was a bit off. We had a reservation for 9:30, and close to closing yes, but still open nonetheless. The service felt slightly rushed with the entrées. Not by a lot but noticiable. Food 10/10 like always

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Felt very welcomed! Had a nice evening, servers very attentive all the time love from for Puerto Rico

NAME: RolandoC
REVIEW: Great food. They need need one or more waiters. Definitely a repeat when back in NYC

NAME: TheresaL
REVIEW: First time in New York loved the food and the ambiance

NAME: GordanaP
REVIEW: Great food, excellent service

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Fantastic!

NAME: janed
REVIEW: Delicious food with excellent wine list for pairing. Cheese board was especially wonderful for dessert!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: After booking a table inside on OpenTable we were told we had to eat outside when we arrived. It’s a pleasant enough space that allows for easier table conversation, but it was not what we booked and does not have the atmosphere of the main restaurant.  The service was good, when we could find them … to replace cutlery that was taken away with plates, to get another round of drinks, to pay the bill.  The food was very good but is overpriced for tapas sized portions.

NAME: LisaA
REVIEW: Wow! What a phenomenal culinary experience! We spent 5 days in Manhattan and dined at several wonderful restaurants, but Casa Mono proved to be our favorite ! The food was exquisite, the atmosphere was comfortable , and the service was exceptional! Our favorite dishes included the octopus, the pork, and the everything!! In other words, we loved it all!

NAME: JamesW
REVIEW: Outstanding food with a wide range of options. And the service was excellent.

NAME: YUVALA
REVIEW: The service was poor, we were ignored most of the time.  When we got up to smoke straight away they wanted to bring us the bill (felt like they wanted us to leave) we were a couple who came to eat at a Michelin restaurant we had heard about.  We were not even asked if the dishes were tasty to us.  We didn't eat the dish and they didn't even care.  We expected much more from a Michelin restaurant.  The attitude, the food, everything was just bad.  It is not clear how this restaurant has a Michelin star.

NAME: AnaC
REVIEW: Birthday dinner

NAME: Glitterbug
REVIEW: Excellent food, great vibe, very accommodating. Thank you for a lovely dinner!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Amazing! Would return in an instant!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: We started with the Jambon Iberico which was amazing.  Patatas Bravas, mushrooms and Garlic, Scallops, and pork belly and beans.  Each dish was served promptly and was top notch.  Would go back again and again.  The wine recommendation was also great.

NAME: SarahT
REVIEW: Always a treat and worth every penny. The fideos with clams and chorizo is a must.

NAME: ABVpb
REVIEW: Can't understand how achieved Michelin star status. Table was unbalanced, food was normal, space was tight.

NAME: EsGar25
REVIEW: First time eating at a Michelin star restaurant and the experience was great. Food was unique and delightful.

NAME: Taste
REVIEW: I come here frequently for a business lunch and recently came on a late weekend afternoon for wine and some small plates with friends. While getting a weekday reservation indoors for lunch is not difficult I was surprised to find that same week reservations for dining indoors even at 4pm were, so plan in advance if you want that experience. The razor clams are always excellent, one of my favorites on the menu, but everything was good. The sauce with the shishito peppers is creamy and delicious and even the simple patatas bravas with smoked paprika feels special here.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Average food considering the price. Service was very so so as well. Music a little too loud too in my opinion.

NAME: AlfredL
REVIEW: High-end tapas experience that won't disappoint.   Great selection of dishes, wine, and desserts.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The best meal I’ve had in nyc in 10 years

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Not the quality I have experienced in the past.

NAME: SageRarelyDisappoints
REVIEW: great food, excellent wine. Definitely worthy of it's 1 Michelin star.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Just perfect!!!

NAME: AndreasI
REVIEW: Great Diner, best Tapas, genius cooking. Friendly service - we enjoyed every minute. Unbeatable pricing - thank you for a great time!

NAME: Kandj
REVIEW: We were a little intimidated by the menu at first, since our Spanish is nonexistent and a number of the dishes were very unusual. However, our server walked us through it well, taking care to specify what dishes my celiac husband could eat. We ordered 4 dishes, and all were really delicious. Our favorite was the scallops, closely followed by the duck. A very special meal!

NAME: Morog
REVIEW: Brian gave us exceptional service, guiding us through the menu and wine selection.  Food was interesting and well composed. Delicious bites of nice proportion

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Birthday. Great service and attention to detail. Excellent food.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Everything was great, bold flavors, great service, even desert was outstanding. Definitely coming back…

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Inventive and delicious! Staff was courteous, helpful and pleasant. I would definitely come back!

NAME: realtyrob
REVIEW: Our reviews had over 17 million views so far this year.  We do not get paid we just love to eat and have fun.  We really loved Casa Mono.  5th time we ate there and always fantastic.  This time we had our favorites and a few new ones.  Must haves are the burrata and figs app.  Great homemade burrata and super sweet figs.  Clams with the noodle thingys on top are awesome and it is a lot of food.  Razor clams char grilled are great with a lovely citrus sauce to die for.  Pigs ears are really good and not a normal dish you see anywhere else.  Love the steak but they have a different word for it I'm not sure what it is.  Sliced and served over some red sauce and has sweet onions and or beets on top.  Really awesome.  For dessert you must get the bread pudding served in a iron skillet.  This is NOT on the menu and you must know about it to get it.  We love to sit at the bar down next to the Chef and watch all the food come out.  You can see how picky the Chef is about each dish and that is one of the reasons they have a Michelin Star.  Great bar too with great drinks.  Check out all of our reviews. If we do not like it we do no review it so all of the ones you see are places that are fantastic. Follow us if you like. We had over over 17 million views in 2022 and we thank you for that. We don't get paid, we just love to eat. Be sure to click on "RobH" at the top of our review on Google Maps to see all of them and to follow us if you like good food and FUN.

NAME: Chimangorey
REVIEW: Tapas place with a very open-mind view. They won't let you order the menu in parts, make sure you check the menu a few times before you order if you're hungry. We sit at the bar, very cozy, and highly recommended for a small party, 2 is perfect. Plates come in order, they come and check o you multiple times. good experience

NAME: LeeO
REVIEW: Wonderful experience. Food was delicious the wine suggestion was perfect. Give it a try if you’re in the area.

NAME: LalaboyM
REVIEW: AMAZING!!! LOVED IT! Adventurous, flavorful, Spanish influenced magical cuisine!!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: I went for a quick bite before work and I got really impressed by the food, ambience, wines. We started with a crudo. I don’t eat cucumbers at all and it was a lovely dish well balanced. The mussels were another of my favorite dishes, loved the chorizo and the fresh es of the mussels. We also order the bone marrow blew my mind with the flavors, no words to explain how delicious it was.  Antonio our server was very nice and caring about our experience. I am definitely coming back for a full dinner and more friends

NAME: JHBB
REVIEW: Very dissapointed for a 1 michelin star restaurant. the food and service never reached the level of other 1 star Michelin star we visited. you ecpect the food to be of higher quality and the service outstanding.  the croquetas where mediocre at best. you expect that a Spanish staple like this would come out perfect. They clearly can not handle the ammount of customers.

NAME: oatmilk
REVIEW: Food was great. The salad, the razor clams, and the steak was incredible.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Great food. A bit loud

NAME: StefaniaK
REVIEW: Authentic, Fresh, Friendly  The small dishes are always delicious and perfect to share. Its a great way to sample several different dishes which are surprisingly filling. Always a treat.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Wonderful every year for our Anniversary Love it!!! Wonderful food, creative fabulous wine!!

NAME: amirn
REVIEW: A very expressive foods but very tasty We do not like very much sea food and pork so we had little choice but two dishes were outstanding

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Excellent ambience. We heard about this restaurant in a newspaper review in Puerto Rico. As puertorrican we want to taste the flavors created by one of our chefs and in a mind time met him. Flavors don’t disappoint us and yesss the chef comes to our table to said hi. That’s was a special moments for us. If you are in NY take time to visit Casa Mono to enjoy an unforgettable tasty food.

NAME: Cici0406
REVIEW: I would say it is uncomfortable experience for me and my family members when we visited Casa Mono as second time.  I invited my family members join the lunch together in Casa Mono this Wednesday, I told them that I really have a good experience in this restaurant and the food are so so amazing. I still remembered when I celebrated my birthday with my friend. The waiters are super welcomed, helpful and engaged.  However the waiter doesn’t introduce herself, she asked if it’s first time visit the restaurant and I say no. We decided to order 4 appetizers and 4 main courses to share. But we got 5 appetizers? I don’t know why there is extra one? We truly don’t know what happens until I saw the bill. I guess maybe we all misunderstood each other? Also I asked her any recommendations, she just gave the names, didn’t explain why it’s good or special. Plus the bread was cold and not fresh, the food quality and amount wasn’t as great as last visit. When we asked paper napkins for so many times, it was so difficult to have it. The waiters are super cold, no smiles. I wish I can pay without the tips, we don’t really get the service what we should get.  Will never ever visit again.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: A gréât place with fabulous food and exceptionally efficient and  courteous service. It’s great that the dishes don’t get dumped all together but keeps coming one after the other. A great place for a casual meal and for special occasions.

NAME: Alexa
REVIEW: One of the best meals in my life. The crema catalana with buñelos de laurel, blew my mind.

NAME: Mrso
REVIEW: Dining at Casa Mono is an exceptional experience.  The food is outstanding and the service impeccable.

NAME: ShannonB
REVIEW: A fantastic dinner and experience. The food was delicious and the service was fantastic. We like sharing plates and this was perfect. It was a wonderful experience that I would recommend.

NAME: michelinstarchaser
REVIEW: The food was delicious and the service was impeccable. Would definitely recommend!

NAME: WLGoh
REVIEW: Very good food and service. Must order the Duck breast with mushroom. Cooked to perfection.

NAME: Nancy
REVIEW: I have been a long time customer of casa mono for years. Love the food there! See you again soon

NAME: HannahC
REVIEW: Great food, great wine, perfect for an early dinner meeting.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Pequeño lugar, gran comida !

NAME: BP15
REVIEW: Very good spot for a special occasion, foot was well proportioned and able to be shared.

NAME: WandaR
REVIEW: Not a place to hang out too long. Severs requested multiple times to cleanup plates from our table while we were still working on them.  Seating person not very friendly.

NAME: ProudImmigrant
REVIEW: We went on a Saturday late afternoon and it wasn’t too crowded . We were seated right away. The food was delicious. We had the razor clams which were nice and big . I personally love the creamy egg with uni and walnut. It was very creamy and tasty. We also tried their foie gras and I felt the sauce was just too sweet. Finally we tried the bone marrow which was prepared perfectly . The service could be better . I had to ask for water couple of times and also the tables are just too small!

NAME: Silvia
REVIEW: I really love the place , service it was excellent. For sure i will recommend this place

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: 50th wedding anniversary

NAME: Rach
REVIEW: Had a lovely evening and the food was delicious! Would definitely recommend to a friend.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Best spot !!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The best tapas I ever had. Will come back and recommend it !!!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: One of the most terrible experiences I had in a while in terms of service, price and experience overall. Eg. our server recommended way too much for minimum order portion, we had to take 1/3 of our order home, and this was a ‘need to order all at once upfront’ request. Too many long waits in between plates. Server and hall manager misunderstood our question and made assumptions regarding seat changes, which was completely it relevant, confusing and condescending. I would not dine here again, nor recommend this restaurant. The taste of the overpriced food was not even good enough to make up for the bad experience we had.   Unfortunate.

NAME: dlowineanddine
REVIEW: Good and Service we’re delicious. It’s small and a little crowded but the outdoor seating is nice. The waitstaff was attentive but not intrusive and the food was good and was coursed out nicely for tapas.

NAME: FaisalS
REVIEW: 20 years in and they haven’t lost a step. Food and experience is as good as it always been. Dining at the kitchen counter is one of our fave date night experiences in the city.

NAME: FriNightDiner
REVIEW: Sitting outdoors wasn't a great experience, but the food was excellent

NAME: Tina
REVIEW: Try the razor clams! The bone marrow is delicious. The service is fantastic. We got 5 items for 2 people and that was enough. We ate a lot of bread and olives as well.

NAME: Slatna
REVIEW: Top notch food in a fun and exciting atmosphere. Very slow service. Long waits for wine, etc.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Incredibly slow service … we asked first for “pan con tomate” and Jabugo … they brought the jabugo but not the bread and tomato to eat it with … it arrived 20 min later … the rest off the food lasts an hour and the place was not full … Food is too salty and too spicy to be Spanish restaurant ( actually spicy as Mexican one ) … I truly don’t understand how they got their Michelin star ( this is why we came to the restaurant) …. I will not recommend this restaurant at all … ( they do have a very good jabugo 5 Jotas , but other than that , is not worth the visit )

NAME: SJOBklyn
REVIEW: A slightly sad first post covid return to one of our faves. We were stuck in a corner and honestly “out of site, out of mind” has never felt more appropriate. At one stage I was calling after a waiter who had been serving at the next table two feet away from me to ask for our water to be topped up and was totally blanked. Even the folks at the next table were shaking their heads at our predicament and saying “they can’t see you there!” Empty glasses aside, the food came in irregular waves. Dessert took forever (my piping hot cappuccino was tepid before it arrived) and then when a waiter finally put it in front of us, a manger was screaming “no!!” at him because I guess it was supposed to have a candle in it to celebrate my wife’s birthday. One waiter only said the words “you done?” to us as he hurried us (and our neighbours) to finish courses, and then swept a pile of crumbs and debris straight into my son’s lap. Plates were cleared away too quickly, the pacing was just wrong, we managed to feel both rushed and neglected at the same time. The music was too loud in our corner of the room so we had to shout to be heard, and most importantly the food just wasn’t as good as it used to be. I spoke to the maitre d’ and a manager on the way out and they said they’d make it up to us “next time”, but I’m not sure there’ll be a next time.

NAME: MichaelH
REVIEW: We visited CASA Mini in our last night in NYC and could not be happier… The small plates were filling and delicious. Even took them off on dessert which is a rare day for us. HIGHLY recommend giving this M1⭐️ a visit

NAME: cd38
REVIEW: Very nice place for lunch, although pricey. The food is excellent and service very friendly and relax

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Amazing as always!

NAME: HowardF
REVIEW: We had a wonderful time. Considerate staff. Knowledgeable sommelier.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: We had family in from Canada. We went there and were very disappointed. Sat us outside when tables avail inside. Host was rude and dismissed me. Waiter told us to order 12 dishes for 4 people, way too much food. Another waiter came later at the end and said it always like 8-12 dishes for 4 people. So we were oversold and couldn’t finish the mediocre food. And the ambience in the outside venue was not nice. Very plain and ugly. Overall a bad experience and very expensive. Won’t be returning again.

NAME: lare
REVIEW: The restaurant opened late and the hostess was somewhat unwelcoming, pointing at a table to show us where it was instead of taking us to it.  Server was annoyed by our presence and basically told us we could not order more than once, everything needed to be in at the same time.  When I asked if we could order more if we were still hungry after we were finished with the tapas, he said it messes up and slows down the kitchen, and stated ‘but I can’t stop you’.  When delivering our last 2 of five dishes, he made it a point to say these are your last plates when setting them down.  Trying to get our drinks and water refilled proved to be a chore.  The pan con tomato was served on dense Cuban bread and extremely over seasoned.  The oxtail stuffed peppers were also over seasoned.  The pork meatballs had not a touch of seasoning in them and we didn’t eat them.  Portions were small, overpriced and poorly executed.  The terrible food, coupled with the poor service makes my decision not to return easy.

NAME: GusK
REVIEW: The food, service, wine list and ambiance was Out of this world.   The kitchen counter is the best place to sit without any doubt.

NAME: Nina
REVIEW: Casa Mono has a lovely menu, however since the restaurant has a Michelin star and is pretty expensive, we did expect better.  The manchego salad, crudo fish and lamb were very good. But the shishito peppers and the garlic mushrooms were nothing special.  In fact the mushrooms really weren't good. It seemed like jarred garlic was used and that the mushrooms did not cook properly. I have had Spanish mushrooms and garlic many times and these just did not stack up to those you can get at the most basic Spanish tapas places. Service was fine.

NAME: JenM
REVIEW: Some of the food was really good! The duck, shishito peppers and pulpo were tasty.  I asked for my skirt steak rare and got raw but seared on the outside.  Bread pudding was great!  Service was great at the beginning but dropped off at the end.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: It’s been several years since visiting Casa Mono but it’s still holding up well. We dined outside so noise level was low (inside it’s quite loud). Food is still quite terrific - tho not as extraordinary as I recall from the past. Service is first rate. Overall still a great dining experience. Highly recommended.

NAME: MandyN
REVIEW: wow!! we had a spectacular dinner at Casa Mono. Fernando, our server helped us by picking the menu and making excellent wine recommendations! it was so nice to sit back relax and enjoy a meal without needing to think or make decisions.  We especially loved the pork belly and scallop dishes as well as the creme brûlée dessert   The outdoor shed could maybe use a fan or something as the air felt a little still but overall was still nice. Love the open kitchen inside the restaurant we will definitely make our reservation there next time!

NAME: PatrickG
REVIEW: Fantastic food, drinks and service. Second time visiting. Amazing place to eat!

NAME: BridgetteV
REVIEW: Wonderful dining Al Fresco for a Friday lunch.  Exquisite food and wine pairings.  Highly recommend!

NAME: ChristianM
REVIEW: I really enjoyed dinner at Casa Mono. The staff was very attentive. The food and drinks were excellent! Would definitively go back.

NAME: Kano
REVIEW: Can’t believe this is Michelin food quality.  If you are ordering anything, only the foie gras is decent.   The waiter was really friendly and kind. Service was really good. But the food, i can’t.

NAME: MirnaS
REVIEW: Love it as always

NAME: annef
REVIEW: Wine sommelier was very kind and made a good selection. Small plates were unique and very tasty.

NAME: BiancaB
REVIEW: My husband and I were unfortunately quite disappointed at our dinner, with the food being the exception. We were sat out on the street in the booth, which i can confidently say was quite terrible, when i booked outside i expected to sit on the street where you have the city ambience in fresh air! No ambiance in the box what so ever, with the A/C blaring. I asked our waiter if we could sit inside and he said no. I asked our waiter to turn off the A/C, he said yes then pretended to do it, so it was still running. So i asked another server to turn it off and finally he did. The food was all yummy, nothing to complain about there however i think the whole experience and the price we paid for a small meal was far too extreme purely because of how terrible our seating spot was. I expected more and would only ever go back if i was inside which is very cute, lively and full of ambience.

NAME: CeciZ
REVIEW: Mejor lugar de NYC

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Anniversary

NAME: LTBK
REVIEW: We ate at Casa Mono to celebrate an anniversary. It's historically been one of our favorite restaurants. The service felt very rushed and vaguely impatient. They were always trying to take away a plate before we were done with it or bringing new dishes when we weren't done with the earlier ones. We felt pressured to eat faster. Once we were finished though, no one came to take our payment until we flagged someone down. The food was mixed. Everything seemed to be done with much less care than in the past and it felt like a very different experience. There was no relaxing with a glass of wine, it was an eat and get out energy.

NAME: AmandaP
REVIEW: Lovely ambiance and delicious food! Will be back to try out the desserts next time. Thank you!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: I have been several times in Casa Mono but I see that the service now is not good. We ordered some appetizers and the table next to us that came later got their appetizer before us.   Then our main course was cold and was not good at all.   It’s a shame it used to be a good Restorant.

NAME: Marius
REVIEW: Great food, great Sommelier. We were are little disappointed because of the service this time: 1. After we got water our waiter was lost for 20 minutes. Didn’t get olives or bread like the other tables.  2. We were asked to order all it once so they would pace it out. This was not what we planned for so we decided to go with 3 dishes. We had a small table and as we felt the three dishes arrived nearly the same time so we had not enough space. Afterwards we ordered one by one which was only possible because the table was not reserved. 3. We had a very unfortunate table in the corner (which is nice) but the AC was blowing so hard that the hair were moving. Unfortunately it was not possible to slow it down or turn it of. 4. Next to our table we had friends of the kitchen staff which was nice. They did get dishes which looked pretty amazing but there were not available on request.   The positives: 1. Sommelier was great and took care of us when the waiter was lost whenever he was able to. We had also a nice bottle of cava and some wines by the glass 2. The food is just delicious. Salad, Fluke, razor clams, skirt steak and the phenomenal bread pudding 🤤🤤  So all in all our experience compared to our first visit last year was a little bit disappointing due to the cold atmosphere (AC) and parts of the service. Food is perfect tough.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Wonderful food and excellent service!

NAME: MelD
REVIEW: I was visiting New York for a few days with a friend who wanted to check out some fine dining during our trip. After looking at reviews and available tables/ bookings, we chose Casa Mono as it is one of the more affordable 1-Michelin star restaurants. Since we weren't too hungry (we had big brunches and our Casa Mono reservation was at 6.15pm), we only ordered 3 dishes: razor clams, bone marrow and lamb belly. We also got some red wine to share. The razor clams arrived first, then they gave us some crudo on the house as the kitchen was running a bit behind with our other dishes. The crudo turned out to be one of our 2 favorite dishes! (My other favorite is the razor clams, my friend's is the lamb belly.)   Lovely restaurant (it's fairly small and intimate), friendly service, reasonably priced and not terribly difficult to get a reservation compared to other Michelin starred restaurants. Would come back if I'm back in New York!

NAME: JoseP
REVIEW: Excellent staff! Our sommelier provided very reasonable options to complement our orders, down to the sherry flight! Plates were served promptly and with just the right progression so we never felt overwhelmed or rushed. Our favorites were the razor clams, Foie Gras of course, bone marrow- all smacked led with umami, and the burrata defied expectations!

NAME: realtyrob
REVIEW: AGAIN ON AUGUST 2022 DIEGO IS THE BEST SERVER IN TOWN.  HE SUGGESTED A LOT OF ITEMS WE DID NOT KNOW ABOUT OR DID NOT UNDERSTAND WHAT THEY WERE.  HE MADE OUR EXPEIRENCE WONDERFUL. ...... WENT BACK AGAIN JUNE, 2022.  SAT AT THE BAR.  EVEN BETTER THAN BEFORE, CHECK OUT THE PHOTOS.   Check out all of our reviews.  If we do not like it we do no review it so all of the ones you see are places that are fantastic.  Follow us if you like.  We had over 7 million views in 2021, over 13 million views in the first 6 months of 2022 and we thank you for that.  We don't get paid, we just love to eat.  Be sure to click on "RobH" at the top of this review to see all of them and to follow us if you like good food and FUN.  We love tapas places.  Think of it as just a bunch of awesome appetizers.  This place is the best one we have tried.  Diego was our server and he took the time to go through the entire menu for us because we could not make heads or tails out of the menu.  We suggest you copy some of our photos and ask for these dishes.  They were all really good.  We had a table but you can eat at the bar and watch the chefs and ask them what all the dishes are as well, but you cannot make a reservation at the bar I fear.  This place is awesome and we will return again and again.  Menu changes constantly but I posted ours below for your reference.  I still am not sure what we had, but OMG was it good.  Check out all of our reviews.  If we do not like it we do no review it so all of the ones you see are places that are fantastic.  Follow us if you like.  We had over 7 million views in 2021 and we thank you for that.  We don't get paid, we just love to eat.  Be sure to click on "RobH" on reviews on Google Maps to see all of them and to follow us if you like good food.

NAME: Becky
REVIEW: We went for a birthday dinner and was expecting nice food, warm service. We didn't get either. The food was expensive compared to its peers in the city, and the service was terrible. We waited at the table for more than 5 minutes before we got water, menu or anything. The wait between dishes was quite long and the server didn't apologize at all when they kept us waiting for so long, when they almost spilt water on my phone, when they dropped the bill at the table with a big bang. We wouldn't expect this level of service for a Michelin star restaurant.

NAME: Yousef
REVIEW: Service was great and the food was creative but a little fatty.  My wife and I had dinner at Casa Mono for her birthday. We booked it because it had a Michelin star and was nearby. The service was good but they didn’t do anything special for her birthday. The food was creative, cooked perfectly, and was served hot and was appropriately spaced out. The only issue was that the flavors were too strong for us or not cooked to our preference. For example, we would have preferred the duck more well (instead of medium rare), the pork belly was incredibly smoky without something fresh / acidic to balance it out, and the fish croquettes had an odd mushy texture we didn’t like.  It wasn’t for us but others might like it. We just expected more given the star and the price.

NAME: Heli
REVIEW: Only downside is that itvis aa very small tapas-like menu. But the food is amazingly great.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Every time I go it’s a very good experience. The service is at top level and the food is great.

NAME: MesrobY
REVIEW: Top 5 restaurants in nyc hands down

NAME: RyanF
REVIEW: Everything we tried was amazing. The foie gras was to die for. The outdoor seating area has air conditioning which is great when it’s hot out.

NAME: Micheke
REVIEW: A neighborhood goto which we always appreciate. The service we get thanks to LOVELY ANNA makes it a real treat! Every dish is flavorful and fun! I especially enjoyed the razor clams tonight! Casa Mono is a SURE THING if you are one who enjoys FLAVORFUL!

NAME: PaulaD

We had high hopes for the food but three of the dishes pictured on the website menu, which we hoped to order were not being served (... and we got three different reasons for why the dishes were not available). The scallops were served first and very good, but from there it went down hill. Patatas Bravas, so loved by my husband during our summer in Barcelona, were a far cry form even tasting like potatoes and it was not because of the intense smoked paprika sauce rather the way the potatoes were cooked, dried out and devoid of their flavor.  We were surprised and disappointed. The three small pork Albondigas were flavorful sitting in a heavy sauce which my husband liked.  We ordered the peppers stuffed with oxtails which also didn't hit the mark; only two, not three,  small shrunken peppers without much oxtail, swimming in a sweet, not savoy, sauce. I liked my vino blanco recommended by the waiter, and the Crema Catalana had a fantastic burnt sugar flavor.  The service was very good all around.  I would go back for the ambience, but also call the day of to make sure the dishes listed on the menu are actually being served.  xoxo

NAME: kimichurri
REVIEW: Casa Mono has amazing tapas and an unpretentious vibe.  My husband and I came in on a Friday night that was perfect for outdoor seating, but since our reservations were for indoors, we just stuck with it--which turned out to be the right decision as we got to sit right next to the open tapas kitchen (and I love watching all the action).  The host was very courteous and accommodated us despite being early.  Our server was engaged and always ready for us.  She even offered to have the sommelier speak to me even if it was just me drinking for the night.  The sommelier was likely very engaging and knowledgeable, and offered me a red wine that was just what I was looking for from their noteworthy and expansive wine list.  Our table was never crowded or cluttered as it was bussed with perfect timing.  Now, onto the food.  A small plate of bread and olives are on the house to start, and they'll give more if requested.  We began with a plate of jamon serrano--our standard pick at every tapas place.  In addition to this, we got the crudo fluke, the duck egg with black truffle, the lamb belly, and foie gras with cinco cebollas.   They were are all great and flavorful, however, it was the razor clams ala plancha and fideos over clams that stole the show.  Both are a must-try.  The menu had a whole lot more tapas I wanted to try, but we were already full by the end of our course.  Because we were full, we decided to skip dessert.  Perhaps next time we can try some!  We are definitely coming back!

NAME: OpenTable Diner

Instead of offering us a seat at the bar or another table to wait at, they made us stand in the cold. I have been here a couple of times, but this time will make me reconsider.

NAME: OpenTable Diner

REVIEW: Amazing. Very friendly staff. It’s a great for a date night. Super cozy

NAME: JonathanC

NAME: NamGuiKim

NAME: michael
REVIEW: Nice Vibe and open air kitchen.  Lots of wine choices.

NAME: AgnesL

This time hiring issues may have affected quality of the personnel and their comportment. Service was fine but nothing special. We enjoyed each other and the experience. Again, the dishes are delicious and special. $145 for two including one drink each, no dessert.

NAME: Joshua
REVIEW: Great food as always! Our server was great, but the host was pretty rude. There were two open two-tops, and we were made to sit outside, despite having a reservation. A friend also had an experience with a rude host. We love the restaurant, and we plan to try it again.

NAME: NishantK
REVIEW: We had 5 dishes and every single one was incredible. Great service by the staff as well. Definitely worth the price. Desserts could have been better.

NAME: TimB
REVIEW: Again unbelievable!! Best lunch in North America. Came here 13 years ago and 15 years ago. Even better today. The food just melts in your mouth. Waiters come from everywhere and they are all kind, sweet and really fun. Recommend this beautiful place to anyone looking for rhe best bistro experience.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The food was great but the table space was tight.

NAME: IvetteD
REVIEW: We loved Casa Mono! Great food, ambiance and service.

NAME: KatieB
REVIEW: The food at Casa Mono never disappoints. We have been coming since it opened and it remains one of our favorite restaurants in NYC.

NAME: Tabatacaldeira
REVIEW: Must go restaurant. Food is amazing , egg truffle is incredible.

NAME: AlexisB

We dined outdoors on a rainy night and the outdoor casita was toasty and cozy.

NAME: EmilyH
REVIEW: The service has really gone down hill. We were so rushed and waitress was quite rude. Staff asked if we wanted our table to be cleared no less than 10 times. I used to love Casa Mono, but I won't be back.

NAME: Gfu26
REVIEW: The pulpo with fennel, garlic razor clams and fideos with clams were the best.  Stay away from the bacalao croquettes-not impressed-at all.

REVIEW: Horrible waitress… got rained on the entire time sitting outside

NAME: KristinM
REVIEW: The food was excellent and our server was the best! Friendly & professional service & recommended perfect wine for our lunch

NAME: Chichi
REVIEW: One of the best places for Spanish tapas in NYC. Went there 10 years ago and the quality is as good as ever.

NAME: Teddy
REVIEW: Outstanding as always ! Thank you for the entire staff to keep that place such a high quality ❤️

NAME: MarieliE
REVIEW: Todo estuvo muy bueno. Servicio, comida. Ambiente. En general muy bueno todo

NAME: HeranD
REVIEW: Excellent food and service. The 4/5 stars is because the place is a bit tight on space and the heat was really too warm. Our waiter Darwin was lovely.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: As good as always.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Seating is too tight

NAME: cila
REVIEW: We were the only party eating outdoor in the heated shed. Perfect setting for this time.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Took my boyfriend for his birthday. We sat outside in the enclosed “outdoor” pods and were comfortable with both the ventilation and the cold temps thanks to heat lamps. The pulpo and bacalao croquetas with orange cream were favorites, as was the salted caramel ice cream with berries surprise birthday dessert. Everything we expected from a Michelin experience — especially appreciated in Covid times.

NAME: TimM
REVIEW: Buzzy, intimate, friendly

NAME: grant

I made the right decision in allowing the somm to pick our bottle of wine, he made a great choice which added to the whole experience. Will be returning!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: The quality of the tapas are outstanding!

NAME: Juank

NAME: KarimE
REVIEW: Great - as always!

NAME: BeatrizH

NAME: SarahT

NAME: Darx
REVIEW: The duck breast, bacalao, and sweetbread are the favorite. Wide wine selection. Ambiance is great for conversation with friend or date especially after hours when noise subsides.

REVIEW: Casa Mono couldn't have been more accommodating, we love them and had a wonderful evening!

Disappointed that one would experience this at a Michelin stat restaurant.  In Covid times you have to reassure consumers that outside they will have a great experience.  So trust me when i say, don't eat outside at Casa Mono if its cold.

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Very unique and interesting plates! Tapas were decent portions and menu was extensive. Would recommend the Scallops and minted cashews, and the fideos with clams and chorizo (less so the goat confit). Would definitely come back!!

NAME: OpenTable Diner
REVIEW: Amazing as usual. We are from Puerto Rico and we try to dine here every time we visit NYC. Delicious food. Great service.

NAME: AbWal
REVIEW: Top tier dinner in Gramercy!!!!

REVIEW: The service was bad. They continue to come and want us to leave even if we haven’t finished our food:)

NAME: OpenTable Diner

NAME: CaroleI
REVIEW: Amazing restaurant with extraordinary food.  Everything is perfectly served with a smile.  I wanted to order everything on the menu, but restrained myself.
